name: markdown strong
description: underscore markdown strong with html tags and italic support
content: *at the begining of a string bold* this_is_bad.jpg _this is a multilone paragraph that is in italics_ _'ital***ics'_ And then she looked at the files on the hard drive. She saw this_is_bad.jpg _bold itlaic_ *_bold italic_* *_bold italic_* _bold italic_ _bold italic_ _*bold italic*_
